contents: 1. leaves 2b-6b: [Ijāzāt, 1775-1780, for Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Anṭākī] / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Murtaḍá al-Zabīdī.
3. leaf 9a: [Ijāzah, 1776, for Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Anṭākī] / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Murtaḍá al-Zabīdī.
6. leaves 13a-13b: [Ijāzāt, 1775-1776, for Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Anṭākī] / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Murtaḍá al-Zabīdī.
7. leaves 14b-41a: al-Ifāḍah al-Madanīyah fī al-irādah al-juzʼīyah.
8. leaves 41b-43a: Fāʼidah. On the advantages of the Ḥanafī madhhab.
10. leaves 50a-52b: Sihām al-namaṭ fī al-mukhammas al-khālī al-wasaṭ.
12. leaves 74b-80a: al-Qawl al-muḥarrar al-zākī fī ijāzat Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Anṭākī.
13. leaves 82b-90a: Muqaddimah fī waqf Ḥamzah wa-Hishām.
15. leaves 102b-106a: Tafṣīl mā ḥaṣala min al-suʼāl wa-al-jawāb fī al-imtiḥān quddām al-fāḍil al-Kirmānī. Exam on al-Muṭawwal.
16. leaves 106b-139b: [Notes in Ottoman Turkish on doctrinal and philosophical subjects] / Davut al-Karsı al-Hanefî.
17. leaves 140b-147b: Ajwibah ʻan asʼilah fī Iram Dhāt al-ʻImād wa-ghayr dhālik.
19. leaves 150b-156a: Ḥusn al-istiqṣāʼ li-mā thabata fī al-Masjid al-Aqṣá.
20. leaves 156b-159b: Risālah fī taḥqīq tawqīfīyat asmāʼ Allāh.
22. leaves 164b-167b: Risālah fī taḥqīq maʻná al-aysa wa-al-laysa.
subject: Hanafites—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
